title: Software Engineer - Backend
description: Build and maintain backend services for a high-traffic web application. Design and implement RESTful APIs, integrate with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL/MySQL) and in-memory caches (e.g., Redis), deploy and operate on AWS (ECS/EKS/EC2), and containerize services with Docker. Establish CI/CD via GitHub Actions (or similar), follow microservices best practices, implement observability (metrics/logging/tracing), and ensure reliability, scalability, and security.
education_required: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field
